992180.name: TY the Tasmanian Tiger 3 Soundtrack
992180.description:
The music from TY the Tasmanian Tiger 3, from the original composer, George Stamatiadis, with a medley of tracks from the third game in the series. (MP3s)

TY the Tasmanian Tiger 3 Bush Rescue OST Steam Edition
